mapper.sql: id, user_id, username, client_id, token, message, login_date, logout_date, request_url, bool_login_success_enum, bool_now_online_enum, offline_type_enum, exception_msg, tenant_id, ip_address, ip_region, ip_region_country, ip_region_province, ip_region_city, ip_region_isp, user_agent, device_name, os_name, browser_name, browser_locale, bool_new_user_enum, login_origin_enum, create_date, create_user_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sys_login_log(
id, user_id, username, client_id, token, message, login_date, logout_date, request_url, bool_login_success_enum, bool_now_online_enum, offline_type_enum, exception_msg, tenant_id, ip_address, ip_region, ip_region_country, ip_region_province, ip_region_city, ip_region_isp, user_agent, device_name, os_name, browser_name, browser_locale, bool_new_user_enum, login_origin_enum, create_date, create_user_id )VALUES
(
#{item.id}, #{item.userId}, #{item.username}, #{item.clientId}, #{item.token}, #{item.message}, #{item.loginDate}, #{item.logoutDate}, #{item.requestUrl}, #{item.boolLoginSuccessEnum}, #{item.boolNowOnlineEnum}, #{item.offlineTypeEnum}, #{item.exceptionMsg}, #{item.tenantId}, #{item.ipAddress}, #{item.ipRegion}, #{item.ipRegionCountry}, #{item.ipRegionProvince}, #{item.ipRegionCity}, #{item.ipRegionIsp}, #{item.userAgent}, #{item.deviceName}, #{item.osName}, #{item.browserName}, #{item.browserLocale}, #{item.boolNewUserEnum}, #{item.loginOriginEnum}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.createUserId} )
